title: The new patches and what comes after kinda makes me ... unsatisfied with riot.
body:
And its not as much tied to the changes themselves ... those are awesome 

Its just that every patch lately drops a series of skinns, sometimes even new chromas onto the live 
surrender at 20 already shown us a load and i repeat a LOAD of new skinns and some chromas 
New champions get those epic and thrilling teasers, their dessign is owershadowing anything we ever saw in this game


This is all cool but one thing makes me feel kinda salty. 


New skinns, ward skinns, chromas, better champion design, all those things go forward to delives us a better product and make us happier. 
Meanwhile ballance itself seems like its left in the dust.

It was always the same procedure, if its op nerf it 
Champiions with low play rate, stay untouched 
Sleeper op's not touched until picked in lcs.

What im getting to is that every part of riot evolwes and becomes better, meanwhile ballance team seems to be forgotten and stagnant.
And i feel like its not their fault, always all of riot's branches that provided something provided their highest quality product possible.
I just feel like there is no investment from riot into making ballance team function better and provide us with better services. Which is kinda eye gouging when you compare what changes in other areas, and its not like ballance team cant somewhat change their stuff, the pbe enviroment is still unable to support ballance testing, thats an easy example and it doesnt seem like anyone is working on it, they just created it and whatever can be done there is done there, those who cant find any use for it just need to handle it.



I just feel like there is improvement everywhere besides the ballance department. And im aware of the fact that ballance team is doing their best.
